solutions.name: Medloop Integrated COVID-19 Vaccine Manager (ICVM)
summary: The ICVM is a COVID-19 vaccine appointment management solution that enables healthcare professionals to upload patient lists and invite patients (via SMS) to book their first and second vaccination appointment based on the default setting of the vaccine type. The solution also offers an intuitive calendar that has the ability to mark open time slots, book patients in and record any adverse reactions from the vaccination directly into the patient record.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution has been assessed for appointments management
Tracks availability of COVID-19 vaccination appointments
Allows bulk sending of vaccination appointment invites and reminders via SMS
Automatically sends appointment cancellation notifications via SMS
Enables patients to book and cancel their own vaccination appointments
This Catalogue Solution has met the Appointments Management - COVID-19 Vaccinations Capability

solutions.name: eVacc
summary: Point-of-care vaccination solution built for COVID-19 and flu, recording pre-screening, consent, vaccination administration and adverse reactions.
Cloud-based, interoperable and reliability-tested against over 500, 000 vaccination load with 0% downtime.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution has been assessed for vaccination and adverse reaction recording
Records COVID-19 vaccination and adverse reaction data for patients registered at different GP practices
Updates previously recorded COVID-19 vaccination and adverse reaction data
Allows viewing of reports on COVID-19 vaccination data
This Catalogue Solution has met Vaccination and Adverse Reaction Recording Capability

solutions.name: SystmOne GP
summary: The SystmOne Point of Care Additional Service supports the roll out of COVID-19 and flu vaccinations. Quick, accurate recording of all data directly into SystmOne. Combines familiar tools, for example, templates and questionnaires.
Seamless access to extra functionality allows for a smooth and more comprehensive experience for users and patients.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution provides an Additional Service that has been assessed for  vaccination and adverse reaction recording, appointments management and cohort identification
Records structured COVID-19 vaccination and adverse reaction data and adds directly to Patient Record
Supports checking availability and booking of COVID-19 vaccination appointments and records when they’re completed
Allows bulk sending of vaccination appointment invites via SMS, email and letters
Supports the cancellation and rescheduling of COVID-19 vaccination appointments
The Additional Service has met the Vaccination and Adverse Reaction Recording, Appointments Management – COVID-19 Vaccinations and Cohort Identification Capabilities

solutions.name: CHS Vaccination Appointment Management
summary: The CHS Vaccination Appointments Management app supports vaccination delivery within GP practices, primary care networks and shared care settings, ensuring the smooth running of all aspects of your vaccination sessions. Using our intelligent appointment tools, you can quickly arrange and manage your appointments sessions and efficiently manage patient arrivals and appointments processing.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution has been assessed for appointments management
Tracks availability of COVID-19 vaccination appointments
Records when a COVID-19 vaccination appointment is completed
This Catalogue Solution has partially met the Appointments Management - COVID-19 Vaccinations Capability

solutions.name: healthya Vaccination Booking System
summary: healthya Vaccination Booking System is a secure, online, appointment management solution that will help manage the roll-out of the COVID-19 vaccination.
Users have a choice of whether they want to use their phone or desktop to access the system.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution has been assessed for appointments management

Allows bulk sending of vaccination appointment invites and reminders via SMS and email
Enables patients to book, reschedule and cancel their own vaccination appointments
This Catalogue Solution has met the Appointments Management – COVID-19 Vaccinations Capability

solutions.name: accuRx
summary: accuRx offers vaccine appointment management functionality via its accuBook Additional Service. accuBook allows the sending of vaccination invite communications, appointment notification, reminders, and the ability for patients to manage their own vaccination appointments.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution provides an Additional Service that has been assessed for appointments management
Tracks availability of COVID-19 vaccination appointments
Allows bulk sending of vaccination appointment invites and reminders via SMS
Enables patients to book their own vaccination appointments
Automatically tracks which patients have received COVID-19 vaccination appointments
Automatically sends appointment cancellation notifications via SMS
This Catalogue Solution has an Additional Service that has met the Appointments Management - COVID-19 Vaccinations Capability

solutions.name: Q doctor
summary: Q doctor is a secure video consultation and appointment booking platform used around the NHS, enabling digital appointment booking (including COVID-19 vaccination appointment management) and remote consultations between clinicians and patients.
